title: Leagues and its new changes
body: Jus wanted to say, even with the problem league has, with in game content being broken 99% of the time, or buying RP taking out more money then it should, it is still a really enjoyable game, and I am glad that new things are being introduced constantly, I mean as a newly level 30 player it makes the serious competitive side a bit hard to understand but I feel as though people need to stop complaining because a new champion is being brought out all the time, change is good and the way they are doing it is good, so happy games in the future all and keep on improving{{champion:17}}

replies.body: It's good to see a positive comment about the new content! Keep it up!

> Jus wanted to say, even with the problem league has, with in game content being broken 99% of the time, or buying RP taking out more money then it should
